name: 灰猫爱拼图
description:
Introduction to the gameGrey cat fell in love with the jigsaw puzzle. Players need to help grey cat put different shapes of squares in the specified image boxes. When it is completely matched, it can pass the customs. The game has a total of 60 levels. The more you go to the back, the more difficult the game will be, but you can get tips through a small light bulb.
When you successfully pass some levels, you can also unlock the gray cat's private album, which records all kinds of beauty atlas. When all CG and levels are unlocked, you can pass.
